data.text: Tie asɛm yi, mo Israelfoɔ, saa mmenabɔ yi fa mo ho:
“Ɔbabunu Israel ahwe ase
Deɛ Otumfoɔ Awurade seɛ nie:
Deɛ Awurade ka kyerɛ Israelfoɔ nie:
Monnhwehwɛ Bet-El,
Monhwehwɛ Awurade na monnya nkwa,
Mo a moma atemmuo yɛ nwono
Deɛ ɔbɔɔ nsoromma, Akokɔbaatan ne ne mma,
Ɔsɛe abandenden ntɛm so
motane deɛ ɔtenetene wɔ asɛnniiɛ
Motiatia ohiani so
Na menim mo mmarato dodoɔ
Ɛno enti, ɔnyansafoɔ yɛ komm saa mmerɛ yi mu,
Monhwehwɛ papa, na moanya nkwa
Monkyiri bɔne, na monnɔ papa;
Enti deɛ Awurade, Asafo Awurade Onyankopɔn seɛ nie:
Wɔbɛbɔ mmena wɔ bobeturo nyinaa mu,
Nnome nka wɔn a
Ɛbɛyɛ te sɛ ɔnipa a ɔdwane firi gyata anim
Na Awurade da no bɛyɛ esum; ɛrenyɛ hann,
“Mekyiri na mepo mo nyamesom mu apontoɔ;
Ɛwom sɛ mode ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ ne aduane afɔdeɛ brɛ me deɛ,
Momfa mo nnwontoɔ gyegyeegye no mfiri me so!
Mmom, momma atɛntenenee ntene sɛ asubɔnten,
“Israelfoɔ, ɛnyɛ me na mode afɔrebɔdeɛ ne ayɛyɛdeɛ brɛɛ me
Mode mo ho nyinaa ato Molek nyame,
Ɛno enti, mɛtwa mo asuo akɔ Damasko nohoa,”
